fields.summary: Alloy, TSS as js not "parsed json"

comments.body: Let me comment quickly that I mirror many of your concerns and plan to create a more robust solution for styling in the next major version of Alloy, but it will wait until 2.0, as this will be a major change involving everything from style formatting to dynamic styling to documentation and examples of all these. It is a massive change/feature that will require a substantial amount of planning to avoid it becoming a succession of band-aid fixes.
